title: Firebase App Distribution helps developers test their apps before launch
content:
When developers want to test their apps and make sure they work, it’s important to test them on groups of people and to ensure that all of the feedback and testing data they get is of a high standard. Googleâ€™s Firebase is a pretty comprehensive set of development tools that can help do exactly that,

The post Firebase App Distribution helps developers test their apps before launch appeared first on XDA.
description: Firebase App Distribution will help developers test their apps prior to their launch, and help developers collect user testing data.
